messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Attention Crew Members: Please do not panic due to the searches.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: I would like to make it clear not to enter my bridge without messaging me in advance. For now, we will be on a Code Yellow. Security are allowed to show weapons if they see a suspicious act.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Meteor Alert

Meteors have been detected on collision course with the station.
